Grammar:   DataElement 6.0
Namespace: groupValueAndProperties

// Mixing Value and Properties will be denigrated beyond 6.1
Entry:        GroupValueAndProperties
Value:        concept
Property:     Simple 0..1
Property:     Coded 0..*
Property:     Simple2 1..*
Property:     Thing 1..1

Element:        Simple
Value:          string

Element:        Coded
Value:          concept

Element:        Simple2
Value:          string

Element:        Thing
Value:          boolean
